column6: COMMANDER KRAKEN and his TECHNO-PIRATES have captured Iron Man, stripped him of his DEEP-SEA ARMOR ... and are attacking HYDROBASE with it! Unarmed and unarmored, can Tony Stark take out Kraken's scurvy crew all by himself?
column8: | inker:Gary Erskine | colorist:Marte Gracia | letterer:Nate Piekos | penciller:Rafa Sandoval | writer:Fred Van Lente | penciller (cover):Skottie Young
